price: ‘হে মুছা! নিশ্চয় ময়েই আল্লাহ! পৰাক্ৰমশালী, প্ৰজ্ঞাময়।
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
